cron_line_1: */5 * * * * curl -f -s -o /dev/null -w "%{http_code}" https://api.levqor.ai/ready | grep -q "200" || echo "Backend down at $(date)" >> /var/log/levqor_uptime.log

cron_line_2: */5 * * * * curl -f -s -o /dev/null -w "%{http_code}" https://app.levqor.ai/ | grep -q "200" || echo "Frontend down at $(date)" >> /var/log/levqor_uptime.log
